QuestData.Title: Siege Breaker
QuestData.Description:
The Golden Lotus can hold their own against the mantid's warriors, of that I have no doubt. Their war wagons, on the other hand, have the capability of crippling an entire squad of our fighters in a single volley.
If we wish to maintain the upper hand in this battle, we will need someone to infiltrate their positions and sabotage their siege engines.
I would like you to volunteer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sabotage $1oa Vil'thik War Wagons in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
